segments.text: Have you been having any problems lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but the nurse at school says that I should have my blood pressure checked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a history of high blood pressure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I have never been told that I have high blood pressure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: High blood pressure is called the silent killer because it hardly ever has symptoms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you check for high blood pressure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are going to use this cuff here , and it will give me a reading .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They tell me how much your heart is working at rest and when pumping blood .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . That will help me know how I am doing .
segments.speaker: S2
